name: Ghost
title: ghost.org
shortDescription: Ghost is an open-source platform designed for modern publishing needs, catering to creators like YouTubers, bloggers, and artists, as well as publishers and businesses. It offers tools for site design, audience growth, and business operations. An example use case is a journalist setting up a subscription-based news outlet with integrated payment solutions.
cons: Limited design templates compared to competitors
Potentially higher operational costs for self-hosting
